45.eng-name: The Book of Virtue, Enjoining Good Manners, and Joining of the Ties of Kinship

hadiths.text: Ibn Umar reported Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) as saying:Gabriel impressed upon me (the kind treatment) towards the neighbour (so much) that I thought as if he would soon confer upon him the (right) of inheritance

chapter.eng-name: Advice To Treat One's Neighbor Well
